nodes.text: Shari Last is the author of Star Wars: Beware the Sith and Star Wars: Rebel Heroes and coauthor of Star Wars: Mysteries of the Jedi.
Shari is a freelance author specializing in film and culture.

In addition to Beware the Sith and Mysteries of the Jedi, Shari has authored a number of the LEGO Star Wars books. She was one of three authors to the LEGO Star Wars Character Encyclopedia and author of LEGO STAR WARS "Battles" ULTIMATE STICKER BOOK. Shar is the author of Ultimate Sticker Collection: Star Wars (2018). Shari has written three Young Readers for DK Readers,The Adventures of C-3PO, Star Wars: Can You Spot a Jedi? and Star Wars: Rebel Heroes.
